uddhumathaka,winilaka,wipubbaka,wichchiddaka,wikkhayithaka,wikkhiththaka,hathawikkhiththaka,lohithaka,pulawaka ha attika dasa asubhaya yanuwen handinwe.pilikul katayuthu se idimi giya mruthadehaya uddhumruthayayi.warnaya wenaswa athi pilikulwu mruthadehaya winilakayayi.idimi giya mruthadehaya nila warnayata hare.eya winilaka asubhaya namwe.pali athi sthanawalin sarawa puya galana mruthadehaya boho pilikulya.eya wipubbaka asubhaya namwe.mehi pubba yanu sarawaya.puyawaya.thiyunu sathin kabali kota kapadama hela athi mruthadeha boho pilikulya.eya wichchiddaka namwe.balu balal hiwal aadi sathun wisin sharira kotas ka athi mruthadeha boho pilikulya.eya wikkhayithaka namwe.mebandu sathun wisin mrutha dehaya kabalikota ka thana thana wisuruwa dama athi mruthadhaya boho pilikulya.eya wikkhiththaka namwe.thiyunu sathwalin anga pasanga kapa thanathana dama athi mruthadeha boho pilikulya.eya hathawikkhiththaka namwe.nathin thana le wagirena mruthadehaya boho pilikulya.eya lohithaka namwe.panuwan ka halena pilikul mruthadehaya pulawaka nam we.
